channel.name: France 24 English FR
channel.title: The Observers
channel.desc: The Observers is a weekly show produced from photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts.

channel.name: France 24 English FR
channel.title: Focus
channel.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus. Find out what's going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, and ecology. Focus has it all covered for you.
